attributes.action: That the "T V Licence"   BE SCRAPPED
attributes.additional_details: Just because you watch Live TV Programs you should not be forced to pay towards the BBC if you do not watch it. The  "TV  Licence was introduced in 1946 when only the BBC station was available.   Now in 2017   we have the choice of 100,s of stations on Freeview & Freesat.  also  SKY TV.   To watch these we should not be force to pay towards the BBC .
attributes.background: Just because you watch Live TV Programs you should not be forced to pay towards the BBC if you do not watch it. The  "TV  Licence was introduced in 1946 when only the BBC station was available.
